get.description: Returns the value of the config with the given name.

200.description: successful request: response contains config value

404.description: request failed: app or config not found

post.description: Sets a new value for the config with the given name.

requestBody.description: new value for variable in body

200.description: successful request: config has new value

404.description: request failed: app or config not found

delete.description: Resets the config with the given name to the default value.

404.description: request failed: app or config not found

get.description: Returns the value of the variable with the given name.

200.description: successful request: response contains variable value

404.description: request failed: app or variable not found

post.description: Sets a new value for the variable with the given name.

requestBody.description: new value for variable in body

200.description: successful request: variable has new value

404.description: request failed: app or variable not found

delete.description: Resets the variable with the given name to the default value.

404.description: request failed: app or variable not found

post.description: Deploys a project .iar file or multiple projects in a .zip file to an application.

parameters.name: X-tail-log
parameters.description: enables live deployment log feedback with chunked response.

fileToDeploy.description: project .iar file or multiple projects in a .zip file

deploymentOptions.description: deployment options as YAML file. If defined, the specific params below will be ignored.

201.description: live deployment logs. Only if 'X-tail-log' header is true. Will report either --- SUCCESS --- or --- FAILED ---.

500.description: deployment failed: response contains fail reasons

503.description: deployment service not available. E.g. in cluster mode
